ygData.subject: RE: Brian Hook
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I remember Brian back from comp.graphics.alogorithms (IIRC).  He used to be such a putz.  But he has learned much since then.  His posts are usually very
ygData.messageBody:
> Date: Mon, 29 Nov 1999 11:04:14 PST
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
> Subject: Great post on item balancing (Long)
>
> Just read this post on the official EQ message boards, an excellent post
> from Brian Hook regarding how weapons are balanced in EQ:
> ----------------------------------------------------------------------
> From: "Brian Hook"
> Since Greg brought it up, I thought I'd write up something about the issue
> of weapon balance and design, specifically for melee weapons. NOTE: a lot of
> this is obvious.

I remember Brian back from comp.graphics.alogorithms (IIRC). He used to be such a putz. But he has learned much since then. His
posts are usually very well thought out (even if you don't agree with him). He is a great asset to the Verant team.

I believe Brian said he wasn't involved with EQ or the expansion directly, but concentrating on future projects (and also not
Sovereign). Now there are rumors that Verant is teaming with LucasArts on a MMORPG based in the Star Wars Universe. I'll take a
wild guess and say that Brian Hook is working on the Star Wars game.

Wayne
